thread.title: Laverne Cox Finally Met Beyoncé And Reacted Like Any Human Would, Really
thread.title_full: Laverne Cox Finally Met Beyoncé And Reacted Like Any Human Would, Really

author: JamesMichael Nichols
title: Laverne Cox Finally Met Beyoncé And Reacted Like Any Human Would, Really
text:
Laverne Cox Finally Met Beyoncé And Reacted Like Any Human Would, Really ❤️️ ❤️️ ❤️️ 02/14/2017 12:13 pm ET JamesMichael Nichols Queer Voices Deputy Editor, The Huffington Post 
Talk about a long time coming! Actress and transgender activist Laverne Cox finally met her idol, Beyoncé. 
Cox has been pretty upfront about her stanning for Queen B over the years, even paying tribute to the artist by recreating her iconic “Single Ladies” look in Cosmopolitan. (She also lost her mind when Beyoncé sent her a holiday card and sweatshirt in 2014.) At the 2017 Grammy’s on Sunday, the pair finally met face to face and Cox was ecstatic. A post shared by laverne cox (@lavernecox) on Feb 12, 2017 at 10:14pm PST A post shared by laverne cox (@lavernecox) on Feb 13, 2017 at 12:46pm PST 
Cox introduced Lady Gaga and Metallica at the Grammy’s Sunday night, using her time on stage to draw attention to the upcoming transgender rights SCOTUS case surrounding Gavin Grimm. 
We couldn’t be happier for you, Laverne!! More:
